summary: Daft Punk was a French music duo who made electronic dance music. They were popular in the late 1990s and 2000s, mixing house music with funk, disco, and rock. Their albums *Homework*, *Discovery*, and *Random Access Memories* were very successful, with hits like "Around the World," "One More Time," and "Get Lucky." They wore robot costumes and rarely appeared in public. Daft Punk also made music for movies like *Tron: Legacy*. They won many awards and were considered one of the most influential dance music acts. The group split up in 2021.
title: Daft Punk
